articles.title: The abject weirdness of AI ads - TechCrunch

articles.content:
“I’m trying to find holiday gifts for my sisters. I open a bunch of tabs, I want my wife’s advice.”
That’s Browser Company CEO, Josh Miller, in his company’s latest ad for its new AI browser, Dia. C… [+7014 chars]
